arts.ttl: CHAN 2024 Match Preview: Senegal v Nigeria
arts.oTtl: NPFL News, Latest News | Nigeria | Footballnews.net
arts.sum: The Nigeria Super Eagles B begin their quest for a maiden CAF CHAN title on Tuesday against the Teranga Lions of Senegal in their opening Group D match of the 8th edition of the tournament, at the Amaan Stadium in Zanzibar. Since taking over in January 2025, Eric Chelle has remained unbeaten as the head coach of the Super Eagles, and he will be keen to extend that run with the home-based lads in this contest against the defending champions.
